snippet: Mr. Novak, a writer for “The Office” and one of the show’s stars, is expected to publish the first book next year.
abstract: Comedian, actor and writer B J Novak sells two books to Knopf in a seven-figure deal; first book, work of fiction, is expected to be published in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Novak, a writer for “The Office” and one of the show’s stars, is expected to publish the first book next year.

headline.seo: B.J. Novak, Actor and Writer, Signs Two-Book Deal
headline.main: B.J. Novak, Actor and Writer, Signs Two-Book Deal
headline.print_headline:
Actor and Writer
Signs Two-Book Deal
